name: Name of the product
company: Company of the product (Ex: Samsung, OnePlus, Apple etc.)
category: Category of the product (Ex: Tablet, Mobile, Earbuds etc.)
date: Last updated date of the data in DD:MM:YY format
time: Last updated time of the data in HH:MM:SS format

occasions.occasion-date: Date of the occasion in DD:MM:YY format
occasions.occasion-name: Name of the occasion (Ex: Diwali, Holi, Republic Day)

platform.name: Name of the platform (Ex: Amazon, Flipkart etc.)

offers.offer-provider: Name of the offer provider (Ex: HDFC, ICICI etc.)
offers.offer-amount: The amount for which the offer is given (Ex: 1100/-)
offers.post-offer-price: The price of the product after offer
offers.tnc: Terms and conditions of the offer

other: Other details of the product (Ex: Warranty Period, Services etc.)
